item.title: Book: Meine Freundin Roxy
item.description: Book: Meine Freundin Roxy # Meine Freundin Roxy is a book for in tech interested children like me. Kenza Ait Si Abbou has written this cool book and Meike Topperwien has illustrated it. The book describes a little girl who finds a robot in a bush, takes it home. There together with her granny she repairs the robot and starts teaching it: She starts with simple language. Girl: “This is a banana.
